mapper.select: SELECT st.rownum as stRownum, st.stNum as stNum, st.stGrade as stGrade, st.stSchoolClass as stSchoolClass, st.stTitle as stTitle, st.stMessage as stMessage, st.stDate as stDate, st.stWriter as stWriter, st.stCategoly as stCategoly, st.stHit as stHit FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum, STUDENTPROPOSAL.* FROM STUDENTPROPOSAL, (SELECT @rownum :=0) n where stFlag=0 ORDER BY rownum ASC ) st
mapper.delete: UPDATE STUDENTPROPOSAL SET stFlag := 1 WHERE stNum = #{stNum}
mapper.select: SELECT st.rownum as stRownum, st.stNum as stNum, st.stGrade as stGrade, st.stSchoolClass as stSchoolClass, st.stTitle as stTitle, st.stMessage as stMessage, st.stDate as stDate, st.stWriter as stWriter, st.stCategoly as stCategoly, st.stHit as stHit FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum, STUDENTPROPOSAL.* FROM STUDENTPROPOSAL, (SELECT @rownum :=0) n WHERE stFlag=0 ORDER BY rownum ASC ) st where st.rownum BETWEEN #{num1} AND #{num2} ORDER BY rownum ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENTPROPOSAL(stGrade, stSchoolClass, stTitle, stMessage, stWriter, stCategoly, stHit) VALUES( #{stGrade}, #{stSchoolClass}, #{stTitle}, #{stMessage}, #{stWriter}, #{stCategoly}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENTPROPOSAL SET stHit := stHit+1 WHERE stNum = #{stNum}
